MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL18 and LL22 area of Rhyl, Abergele and Bodelwyddan, affecting properties in Coronation Close, Ffordd Terfyn and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  12:51PM. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 3PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.30PM on 2nd February 2021
